Package controller

Class InternshipController

java.lang.Object
controller.InternshipController
public class InternshipController extends Object
Controller class that manages the lifecycle of internships.

Provides operations for company representatives to create, edit, delete and manage internships, for staff to review and approve them, and for students to view available internships. Also handles slot updates and report generation.

  • Constructor Details

    • InternshipController

      public InternshipController()

  • Method Details

    • createInternship

      public static Internship createInternship(String title, String description, Company company, CompanyRep rep, InternshipLevel level, String preferredMajor, int slots, Date openingDate, Date closingDate)
      Creates a new internship for the given company representative, applying validations such as login status and maximum internship count.
      Parameters:
      title - internship title
      description - internship description
      company - company offering the internship
      rep - the company representative creating it
      level - internship level (basic/intermediate/advanced)
      preferredMajor - preferred major for applicants
      slots - number of available slots (max 10)
      openingDate - application start date
      closingDate - application end date
      Returns:
      the created Internship, or null if creation failed

    • editInternship

      public static void editInternship(CompanyRep rep, Internship internship, String newTitle, String newDescription, InternshipLevel newLevel, String newPreferredMajor, int newSlots, Date newOpeningDate, Date newClosingDate)
      Edits an existing internship, updating its fields if the representative is logged in. Slot count is capped at 10.
      Parameters:
      rep - company representative editing the internship
      internship - internship being modified
      newTitle - updated title
      newDescription - updated description
      newLevel - updated level
      newPreferredMajor - updated preferred major
      newSlots - updated number of slots
      newOpeningDate - updated opening date
      newClosingDate - updated closing date

    • reviewInternship

      public static void reviewInternship(CareerCenterStaff staff, Internship internship, boolean approve)
      Allows a career center staff member to approve or reject an internship submitted by a company representative.
      Parameters:
      staff - the reviewing staff member
      internship - the internship under review
      approve - true to approve, false to reject

    • deleteInternship

      public static void deleteInternship(CompanyRep rep, Internship internship)
      Deletes an internship created by a company representative and marks all associated applications as ApplicationStatus.DELETED.
      Parameters:
      rep - the company representative requesting deletion
      internship - the internship to delete

    • decreaseSlot

      public static void decreaseSlot(Internship internship)
      Decreases the remaining slot count for an internship. If slots reach zero, the internship status becomes InternshipStatus.FILLED.
      Parameters:
      internship - the internship whose slots are reduced

    • increaseSlot

      public static void increaseSlot(Internship internship)
      Increases the remaining slot count for an internship. If the internship was previously filled, it becomes approved again.
      Parameters:
      internship - the internship whose slots are increased

    • viewAvailableInternships

      public static List<Internship> viewAvailableInternships(Student student)
      Returns a list of internships available for a given student based on visibility, approval status, slot availability, and application dates.
      Parameters:
      student - the student viewing available internships
      Returns:
      a list of available internships

    • generateInternshipReport

      public static void generateInternshipReport(CareerCenterStaff staff, String filterStatus, String filterMajor, String filterLevel)
      Generates and prints a report of internships, optionally filtered by status, preferred major, or level.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member requesting the report
      filterStatus - optional status filter
      filterMajor - optional major filter
      filterLevel - optional level filter
